title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document all requirements for the TransparentGoalTracker system, including user stories, functional requirements, non-functional requirements, constraints, assumptions, and any relevant diagrams or models.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the frontend, backend, database, and any necessary integrations or third-party services.

title: Implement Frontend
description: Develop the user interface and frontend components for goal-setting, progress tracking, and data visualization.

title: Implement Backend
description: Develop the backend services and APIs for managing goals, tracking progress, and integrating with other systems or data sources.

title: Set up Database
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing goals, progress data, and any other necessary information.

title: Implement Authentication and Authorization
description: Develop a secure authentication and authorization system for managing user access and permissions.

title: Implement Collaboration and Sharing Features
description: Develop features for sharing goals, progress updates, and visualizations with team members and stakeholders.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application to various environments.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute various testing activities, including unit testing, integration testing, performance testing, and user acceptance testing.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for users, administrators, and developers, covering installation, configuration, usage, and maintenance.
